title: kindred
body: when does kindred come out for oceania is it october 5th or 6th ??

replies.body: its the 7th now.... do i have to wait next year? ;-;

Kindred has been delayed until patch 5.20 due to a rather large bug with certain abilities. More info here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/rEHRE4hu-kindred-delayed-until-520

Besides, there was no specific date mentioned for Kindred's release, bottletop was simply sharing an estimated guess.
she is getting realised on the 5th but i dont know if that oceania or australia
And where did you get that from?
surrender at 20 quoted riot employee saying the they will be released on the 5th of october im prerry sure
The surrender at 20 article states "during the week of October 5th", so that doesn't mean it will be tomorrow.
im just trying to see if it means the 6th due to the americans diffrence time frame then ours ?

No, it means Kindred will be released some time during the period of 5/10/15 through to 11/10/15, assuming Monday as the start of the week.

Chances are it will be based on the time in the Americas, but that doesn't mean it will be the 5th (or, rather, 6th for us).
I think 5th. Hi heartvine long time no see
In case you missed it, Wrekz commented in the Q&A that Kindred is planned to be released next week (Week of October 5th). Hold tight, THEY ARE COMING!
